lines.text: You know Fort Knox; every kid has one. That's the place where the REAL valuables are stored things like baseball cards, candy cigarettes, Pez dispensers, wax lips, the full 110-piece infantry division with the 14 kneeling gunners, and, of course, "Sgt. Fury" comic books.
Ever notice that houses are ten times noisier when they're empty?
They say that A. R. Asher is the last living Dead Letter Officer in America.
Here, take my car. What the heck.
